title: The Eyes have it
creator_credit: Dave Gilbert, Interkal Productions and National Society for the Prevention of Blindness
brief_description: Marionettes led by an owl accompanied by a piano playing fox and the fern forest orchestra sing a song of advice about eye care. Other marionettes act out the words of the song. Later the song is repeated, with some different activities while the words are flashed on the screen.
